title: Enduring personality change after catastrophic experience
block: Disorders of adult personality and behaviour
category: Enduring personality changes, not attributable to brain damage and disease
inclusion: Personality change after: concentration camp experiences
Personality change after: prolonged: captivity with an imminent possibility of being killed
Personality change after: prolonged: exposure to life-threatening situations such as being a victim of terrorism
exclusion: symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified
personality and behavioural disorder due to brain disease, damage and dysfunction
